hero.title: Our Children Association
hero.subtitle: for Persons with Disabilities
hero.tagline: We believe in every person's right to a dignified life and equal opportunities

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower persons with disabilities and their families through comprehensive quality programs, enhance their capabilities, advocate for their rights, and provide a safe and motivating environment that ensures equal opportunities for growth and development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: An inclusive and just society where persons with disabilities enjoy their full rights and participate actively and independently in all aspects of life.

programs.title: Our Programs & Services
programs.subtitle: Comprehensive services supporting persons with disabilities and their families

activities.title: Latest Activities
activities.subtitle: Events and initiatives promoting community inclusion

news.title: Latest News
news.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest news and developments

cta.title: Make a Difference
cta.subtitle: Your donation creates real change in hundreds of families' lives

about.title: About Us
about.hero_subtitle: A licensed non-profit association serving persons with disabilities since 2016
about.overview: Our Children Association for Persons with Disabilities is a licensed charitable organization founded to serve persons with disabilities and their families, believing in their full right to a dignified life, education, care, and community integration. We work as a team with community partnership to be a true support for every family.
objectives: Creating an entity and reference for persons with disabilities
Advocating for the marginalized rights of persons with disabilities
Seeking to integrate persons with disabilities into all community activities
Providing families with assistive devices and medical supplies
Providing employment opportunities for qualified cases
Developing persons with disabilities in all economic and social aspects
Integrating persons with disabilities in educational institutions
Breaking barriers to make society more inclusive and accessible

achievements.label: Families received food packages and clothing vouchers
Rehabilitation and educational sessions for children and youth
Assistive devices and medical supplies distributed
Partnerships with local and international institutions
Homes modified for persons with disabilities

future: Finding a new headquarters that meets future needs of persons with disabilities
Pressuring authorities to fully implement the disability law
Achieving minimum 5% employment of persons with disabilities in public and private institutions
Strengthening local and international partnerships to expand services

programs.title: Programs & Services
programs.subtitle: Comprehensive programs supporting persons with disabilities and their families
programs.noItems: No programs published at this time

static.title: Speech & Communication Program
static.description: Teaching and supporting speech for children under the supervision of a specialized speech therapist, with intensive communication programs for all cases.

static.title: Special Education
static.description: Specialized educational programs designed to meet the individual needs of each student with disabilities.

static.title: Learning Difficulties Program
static.description: Early diagnosis and intervention to help children with learning difficulties reach their full potential.

static.title: Community Inclusion
static.description: Various activities to integrate persons with disabilities into society, including summer and winter clubs and recreational events.

static.title: Physical Rehabilitation
static.description: Helping and rehabilitating persons with physical disabilities to move easily and improve their independence.

static.title: Parent Awareness Program
static.description: Awareness programs for parents on how to deal with cases and complete the treatment cycle through communication with supervisors.

donate.title: Donate & Support Our Mission
donate.subtitle: Your donation changes a whole family's life
donate.impact_1: 30$ provides an assistive device to a person in need
donate.impact_2: 75$ provides a food package for a needy family for a full month
donate.impact_3: 150$ funds 10 therapy sessions for a child with disabilities
donate.account_name: Association of Special Needs Parents - Our Children
donate.note: Please include your name when transferring. We will contact you to confirm receipt.

volunteer.title: Volunteer With Us
volunteer.subtitle: Join the change team and be part of our journey of hope
volunteer.why_1: Make a real difference in the lives of persons with disabilities
volunteer.why_2: Gain valuable hands-on experience in social work
volunteer.why_3: Be part of a cohesive and caring community
volunteer.why_4: Develop your leadership and collaboration skills
